Class Day

java.lang.Object
  Day

public class Day
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a day Contains scheduling methods

Author:
Dmitri Samoilov

Field Summary

          Number of currently available time slots
 int startSlot
          Start time of current time slot in minutes
 
Constructor Summary
Day()
          Day constructor Initialises hash map to 36 elements (maximum number of 30-minute programmes) Sets time slot from 6AM to 12AM and number of slots to 1

Constructor Detail

Day

public Day()
Day constructor Initialises hash map to 36 elements (maximum number of 30-minute programmes) Sets time slot from 6AM to 12AM and number of slots to 1

public int check(int duration,
                 int time)
Checks whether there is enough time in the schedule for a particular programme

Parameters:
duration - The duration of a programme in minutes
time - Time in minutes to begin checking from
Returns:
Number of 30-minute slots available

Deletes a programme from the schedule

Parameters:
